group_1.textLeft: Um...err...

group_1.textRight: You're Homura Akemi. I've heard of you.
Though you are an individual of interest who@continues to defy us...
I appreciate your help.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I didn't do that much.
You were already fighting when I got here.
Thanks to you I don't think any of the@patients were harmed.
What's your name?

group_1.textRight: [chara:390000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I-I can't!
I can't chat with a Magical Girl who has@not joined our cause!
Let alone...
Let alone tell one my personal information!
If I were to let the smallest thing slip...
I would face severe retribution! Their wrath@would be swift. I'd be reduced to dust!

group_1.textLeft: How horrible...

group_1.textRight: I-it most certainly is not!

group_1.textLeft: But not being allowed to talk to others, or@even tell them your name...

group_1.textRight: R-rules are a must for any organization!

group_1.textLeft: But, if all Magical Girls came together to@help each other, we wouldn't need that...
Everyone in Kamihama is so nice.
There's no need for you to depend on the@Wings of the Magius.

group_1.textRight: F-for me, the Magius' teachings are an@absolute necessity!
So long...so long as I have the doctrine@to guide me...
I can endure despite the knowledge that my@promised day is on the horizon.
Because our gods alone...
...shall disperse fortune equally onto @us all...
Don't act like you understand!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...
You're right...
Everyone... Everyone has their reasons.
Did you leave Kamihama to recruit other@Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: I do come to recruit, but today I'm here for@personal reasons.

group_1.textLeft: Visiting someone in the hospital?

group_1.textRight: No.
I came in search of a sweets shop that was@located on the same road as the hospital.
But it wasn't there...

group_1.textLeft: Um, me too!
I think we might be looking for the same@place...
But it's not there anymore, that shop.

group_1.textRight: R-really?
I wasn't sure because it was such a long@time ago.
But I guess I was right...

group_1.textLeft: I was hospitalized right here in this@hospital until recently.
I didn't know that the sweets shop was @gone, though...

group_1.textRight: [chara:390000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
I currently live in a student dorm in@Kamihama...
But I'm from Mitakihara.
A ways back I was hospitalized here because@it was relatively close to home!

group_1.textLeft: (Is it okay for her to tell me that...?)

group_1.textRight: I came home to visit my family yesterday, so@I made my way here from my house...
Ah! I let something else slip!
So you are trying to get me to talk about@our secrets!
But unfortunately for you...
I'm a low-ranking underling and don't know@anything of value!

group_1.textLeft: Umm... I didn't mean to...
It's just that I was sad that the sweets@shop is gone...
So it was nice to have someone to talk to.
I never thought I'd meet a girl who stayed@in the same hospital as me...
And came here today for the same reason...

group_1.textRight: N-now that you mention it...
Saying our meeting today was fated probably@wouldn't be an exaggeration.
